annonstext:
Tele Radio develops, manufactures and sells solutions for industrial wireless remote-control systems. The company was founded in Lysekil, Sweden in 1955 and has since expanded to become Tele Radio Group with world-wide presence. Headquarter is located in Gothenburg with subsidiaries in Europe, USA and in Asia. In addition to our subsidiaries we have dealerships and partners all over the world. Learn more about us at www.tele-radio.com.

About Tele Radio R&D

We are a small development team in Gothenburg who believes that developing great products is the result of having skilled, passionate and empowered individuals. At our R&D you will experience the joy and freedom of a smaller company with short decision paths, flat organization and where the communication with colleagues, other departments and customers always are open. At the same time you’ll have the resources, development potential and international context that often only could be found at much bigger companies. Our product development is today taking place in Sweden, Turkey and China which are all managed from R&D at our Headquarter in Gothenburg.

About The Position

We are now in the process of expanding our R&D organization in Gothenburg with one more Software developer. You will be part of a team responsible for developing tools for customization, configuration and management of our industrial remote-control systems. We are proud to be a leading provider of customized solutions to our customers and these cloud-based tools are a key in this ambition. We seek you that loves to develop reliable software with high usability and appreciate being an important colleague within a team where you have a lot of possibilities to influence. 

Our current development stack includes: Python, Javascript, Docker, GIT, Gitlab, Jenkins, Linux, AWS, Bash, MariaDB, PyQt5, Terraform, Antlr4, Kotlin (Android), Java, Spring boot, Flask, Django 

We believe you have:

	A passion for technology
	Experience of software development
	Fluent English language, both written and verbal
	Proficiency in python
	A drive to understand the users and build software with high usability

If you have experience in one or several of the following areas, it is an extra plus:

	Experience with a VCS, preferably GIT
	Experience with DevOps
	Comfortable working in a Linux terminal
	CI/CD technology
	OCI container technology
	Basic understanding of a lexer/parser/compiler
	Experience with cloud technology and IaC

We are growing so come and grow with us!

For more information: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME HR, email:  EMAIL 

Application: send your application to  EMAIL 

www.tele-radio.com
